title: Borra...

replies.body:
Borra_: "Here in my garage, just bought this new iPad Mini here, fun to use in these Hollywood Hills. But you know what I like alot more than materialistic things? NAWLIDGE. In fact, I am more proud of the seven new bookshelves that I had to get installed to hold the new 2000 books I bought."

Had to, saw the bookcases :P

replies.body: Hello. Borra please post any face reveals on our "Show your face to the world" post. It was made specifically for that purpose. Link: https://avicus.net/forums/f3e99e4de. I will proceed to locking the topic.
